languages.text:
"Мир — сложный гобелен, до нитей жадный:
Одной не хватит, чтоб сплести узор.
Три воли, слившихся в тандеме ладно,
Дадут в достатке пряжи для него,
Уродливые шрамы недоверья
Застлав покровом тонким уговора".

traits.locale_text: "Чтоб мир вернуть, должны здесь все понять — три нити судеб сплетены в одну. Вот Саренрай, за тим — Купцы идут... Кто занет, вдруг они слова заветные найдут, и шрамы недоверья зарастут".
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."
languages.original_text:
"Мир — сложный гобелен, до нитей жадный:
Одной не хватит, чтоб сплести узор.
Три воли, слившихся в тандеме ладно,
Дадут в достатке пряжи для него,
Уродливые шрамы недоверья
Застлав покровом тонким уговора".

languages.text:
「複雑に絡まり合ったものは秩序
数多の糸が歪みと横糸には必要。
この設計で、三つの意志はそろって大わらわ
器用な織り手を強欲が満たす。
過去の疑惑が生んだむごい傷は嘆き悲しんだ
密やかなる誓約の紗に包まれ、覆ってしまおう」
languages.original_text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."

traits.locale_text:
「複雑に絡まり合ったものは秩序
数多の糸が歪みと横糸には必要。
この設計で、三つの意志はそろって大わらわ

過去の疑惑が生んだむごい傷は嘆き悲しんだ
密やかなる誓約の紗に包まれ、覆ってしまおう」
traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text:
“和平是一幅繁复的织绣，
织就经纬需要许多丝线。
此处的和平由三股意志共同造就，
织工的巧手满足其贪念。
过往猜忌的巨大伤疤，
如今已经盖上了细密的薄纱。”
languages.original_text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."

traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text:
« La tapisserie complexe qu'est la paix
se tisse sur une trame aux fils nombreux.
Le motif de celle-ci est fait de trois volontés
ourdies ensemble par un tisseur talentueux.
Les hideuses cicatrices d'une méfiance déplorée
seront alors voilées par un tissu vaporeux. »
languages.original_text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."

languages.text:
«Un tapiz complejo brinda la paz, en especial uno
cuyos muchos hilos exijan urdimbre y trama.
Para este diseño, tres voluntades creen oportuno;
que su codicia del hábil tejedor sean la proclama.
Las cicatrices que dejó la desconfianza de alguno
conformarán ahora del delicado tejer un amalgama».
languages.original_text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."

traits.speaker: Quetza_HarlequinZanni

languages.text:
"Ein Wandteppich bedeutet Frieden und
Verlangt viele Fäden, die ihn formen.
Diesen sponnen drei Willen gemeinsam
Seine Gier gestillt durch des Webers Hand
Die Narben der Vergangenheit beklagt.
Der Übereinkunft Flor wird nun verhüllt."
languages.original_text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."

languages.text:
"Karmaşık desenlerle işlenmiş bir kilimdir barış,
O ki iplikleri öteboyutla örülmek ister karış karış.
Bu motifte üç irade bir arada örülecek,
Tamahkârlığı dokumacının hünerli ellerinde giderilecek.
Geçmişteki kuşkuların dehşet dolu izleri, matemin ardına siner.
Bir arada örülen o ince teller, şimdilerde örtülmeyi bekler."
languages.original_text:
"A tapestry complex is peace, and one
That many threads demands for warp and weft.
For this design, three wills together spun
Its greed will sate in hands of weaver deft.
The gruesome scars of past distrust bewailed
With compact's subtle gauze shall now be veiled."
